issue.title: [Plasma] Remove test shell scripts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1810](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1810). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The shell scripts in https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/cpp/src/plasma/test are not used, all tests are run via cmake, so we should remove them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1810?focusedCommentId=16253366) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1320
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1320>
